Martin, are you able to reproduce this problem? If so, what are the field entries on the search page that leads to this exception in the log?

The original report was from Sumit Sarkar, I never tried this myself.
Sumit, do you remember what you did?

I access remote HP-UX file system using Samba (mapping in Y:, Z: etc). When I opened up the local file system wihtin RSE, all those remote file systems also show up. I right clicked one of them (e.g., Z:) and tried to search some files (like *.txt), then I got NPE.

I am attaching my .log file.

Created an attachment (id=52248)
.log file with search NPE

I can not reproduce this problem any more. I can right click on a file in a windows drive mapped to an AIX server, similar to a Samba share set up on HP-UX as described in the problem. As far as RSE is concerned, it's just another Local file. Please reopen if the problem still occurs.
